title: CS4 Master Collection license has expired lifetime workaround
description:
FROM yomyshit:

For those of you who have installed the CS4 Master Collection and months later received a "License for this product has expired" popup when trying to open Photoshop or other CS4 applications.......this workaround will fix your licensing woes indefinitely

The main problem is that after a certain period of time.....the AMT Licensing file refuses to allow the CS4 application to load.......for me if was on Jan 20th.......I even changed my system time back 1 day and photoshop actually started working again.....but this is a hassle, So I found a permenant solution

Apparently after reading around, I discovered that the amtlib.dll file that is contained in each individual application folder in the CS4 Master Collection needs to be replaced with a "lifetime version" to get your product working again

Contained in this torrent is the amtlib.dll file as well as a crack.bat script that will replace each old amtlib.dll file in each program folder with the "lifetime version"

there should be no need to change your serial, but I included a keygen that works if anyone needs it

the only code that is executed in the crack.bat file is this:
FOR /F "tokens=*" %%D IN ('DIR "C:Program Filesamtlib.dll" /S /B') DO copy /Y "amtlib.dll" "%%D"


Also, I think I should mention that I originally had downloaded and installed the trial version of the CS4 Master Collection......this is the installation that I am applying this crack to

And once again.....make sure that you have changed your hosts file to include "activate.adobe.com"

UPDATE(answer to question about hosts file):
Open the file in notepad, erase everything and copy and paste the info below to prevent adobe from accessing there server for activation.
hosts file should look like this:

C:WINDOWSsystem32driversetchosts
127.0.0.1 localhost
127.0.0.1 activate.adobe.com


UPDATE(anwser to question about changing serial):
I found a way to change my serial through adobe's website....
They have an application that is used as a license repair/update tool for cs3/cs4 products......you can also use it to delete your license records which will then allow you to reenter this information when you load an application.......instead of repairing your license........enter "0" when it gives you the option to delete your license

Go Here to get the tool:
http://www.adobe.com/support/contact/licensing_download_eula.html
Or here is a direct link for the Windows version
http://download.macromedia.com/pub/support/tools/LicenseRecovery109.zip

ONCE AGAIN!! THERE SHOULD BE NO NEED TO CHANGE YOUR SERIAL!!! BUT IF YOU FEEL YOU NEED TO OR THIS CRACK DOESN'T WORK.....DELETE IT AND YOU WILL BE PROMPTED TO ADD A NEW ONE
